subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The 14th-seeded Marin Cilic, who defeated Kei Nishikori, is the lowest seed to win the U.S. Open since Pete Sampras won the 2002 tournament as the No. 17 seed.
snippet: The 14th-seeded Marin Cilic, who defeated Kei Nishikori, is the lowest seed to win the U.S. Open since Pete Sampras won the 2002 tournament as the No. 17 seed.
